title: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a £30,000 tour of every COMO hotel
text: The 13 elegant properties ­ which span from Bali to Bhutan, Miami to the Maldives ­ are each individually curated to reflect its location. The hotels offers luxury travel experiences, personalised service, outstanding cuisine as well as signature Accommodation is on a b&b basis and is on the entry level room category with an upgrade to a higher room category if availability allows. Included in the prize are boat transfers when necessary (i.e. Parrot Cay and the Maldives). Stays at each property must be taken during low to mid season with Christmas, Easter and high season weeks being blackout periods. How to enter Follow this link to tell us about your favourite travel companies and destinations - and to enter the draw for one of 27 prizes . You will need to leave your name, telephone number and a valid email address. See here for full terms and conditions . The hotels UK The Halkin by COMO ‐ 2 nights A London luxury hotel in the city’s Belgravia district, The Halkin by COMO promises an elegant and discreet environment. Widely regarded by loyal regulars as a home away from home, you can expect faultless service and Asian‐inflected style to all 41 contemporary suites and rooms. Cuisine at Michelin starred Ametsa with Arzak Instruction focuses on contemporary, new Basque Cuisine. Metropolitan by COMO, London ‐ 2 nights A cool, contemporary central London luxury hotel, Metropolitan by COMO combines accurate service, sophisticated design and a vibrant Park Lane location. There are 144 rooms and suites as well as 19 long‐stay apartments, Nobu for Japanese‐Peruvian cuisine, a lively Met Bar and Asian‐inspired therapies from COMO Shambhala Urban Escape. Thailand Metropolitan by COMO, Bangkok ‐ 2 nights A contemporary Bangkok luxury design hotel, Metropolitan by COMO combines passionate service with a vibrant award‐winning Thai restaurant 'nahm', 'glow' restaurant, Met Bar and proximity to the city’s renowned shopping and nightlife. All 169 rooms and suites offer the cool, light‐filled spaces typical of COMO Hotels and Resorts, while our 25m outdoor pool, yoga studio and spa secure our enduring appeal among design‐focused travellers seeking a place of calm amid the urban buzz. Point Yamu by COMO ‐ 3 nights Point Yamu by COMO is a new Phuket luxury resort located at the tip of Cape Yamu overlooking the Andaman Sea and the dramatic limestones of Phang Nga Bay. Interiors by Italian designer Paola Navone offer a unique expression of contemporary Thai luxury, alongside a COMO Shambhala wellness retreat and two world‐class restaurants for Thai and Italian cuisine. The resort is a 25‐minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Combined with COMO’s Metropolitan hotel in Bangkok, guests can enjoy a dual‐centre experience mixing city and island life. US Metropolitan by COMO, Miami Beach ‐ 2 nigh ts An Art Deco luxury design hotel, Metropolitan by COMO, Miami Beach is a 74‐room Miami hotel in the heart of the Miami Beach historic district, overlooking America’s most iconic beach. Metropolitan Miami Beach delivers the perfect blend of rest and revelry, urban modernity and period charm by way of light‐filled rooms, a COMO Shambhala Urban Escape, and leading edge interiors by the Italian designer, Paola Navone. Caribbean Parrot Cay by COMO Parrot Cay by COMO is an award‐winning Turks and Caicos luxury resort set on its own private island. With 1,000 unspoilt acres and mile‐long beach, we deliver foot‐in‐the‐sand luxury. All rooms, suites and beach villas have soothing interiors along with COMO’s service ethic, holistic therapies, yoga, diving and worldclass cuisine. Maldives Cocoa Island by COMO ‐ 3 nights Cocoa Island by COMO is an intimate private Maldives island resort with 33 overwater suites allowing you to slip right into the turquoise lagoon to explore an exceptional house reef. Encircled with powder white sand, the carefree, understated luxury experience includes holistic wellness treatments at COMO Shambhala Retreat, South Indian‐influenced cuisine and worldclass diving. Maalifushi by COMO ‐ 2 nights Maalifushi by COMO is the first luxury resort in the Maldives to open in the pristine Thaa Atoll in the archipelago’s southwest. With overwater villas and beach suites, Maalifushi is therefore the ultimate away‐from‐it‐all destination for families, couples, surfers and divers. There are some excellent breaks nearby as well as a string of uninhabited private islands, where there are seasonal hammerhead and manta ray sightings. Bhutan Uma by COMO, Paro and Punakha ‐ 3 nights Our Uma hotels in Bhutan are located in two of the country’s most important regions: one in Paro Valley, close to many of Bhutan’s great cultural landmarks, the other in the Punakha Valley a five‐hour drive away. Our rooms, suites and private villas are conceived as intimate, luxury retreats to be enjoyed after a day’s cultural activities and adventure pursuits, from Himalayan trekking to archery and white‐water rafting. As a fully‐licenced tour operator with English‐speaking guides, COMO offers a seamless, hassle‐free travel service that takes care of your visas, flights and guides. We can also arrange special requests such as private jet charter and regional trips to neighbouring countries including Thailand, India and Nepal. Our dual‐centre packages such as ‘Himalayan Explorer’ offer a choice of five‐, seven‐ or 10‐night itineraries. Bali Uma by COMO, Ubud ‐ 2 nights Uma by COMO, Ubud is a luxury central Bali hotel. The contemporary Asian design of our 46 rooms, suites and villas are relaxed, sunshine‐filled spaces. Our restaurants, Kemiri and Uma Cucina, boast world‐class cuisine while COMO Shambhala Retreat at Uma Ubud focuses on holistic wellness, with active pursuits including temple visits, biking and trekking. COMO Shambhala Estate - 3 nights COMO Shambhala Estate is located near Ubud, Bali—a true ‘Retreat for Change’ with resident experts including a yoga teacher, Ayurvedic doctor and residence dietician. The holistic, 360-degree approach offers signature massage therapies and beauty treatments. A state-of-the-art gym and outdoor activities such as hiking and climbing make the most of the Estate’s unique location. Cuisine is always nutritionally balanced while the residences, suites and villas suit independent guests, couples or families. Australia COMO The Treasury - 4 nights COMO The Treasury is a luxury hotel located within Cathedral Square, the new CBD in Perth, Australia, occupying the 19th-century ‘State Buildings’. Restoration by Kerry Hill Architects has revealed the grand Victorian-era facade, while inside COMO has imbued its trademark contemporary style. Dining options include Wildflower for European dishes, and the Post bistro. The Treasury Lounge and Bar is an elegant spot for drinks. COMO Shambhala Urban Escape offers a range of Asian-inspired therapies as well as yoga.
